Book.productname: A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court
Book.description: A Connecticut Yankee travels back to King Arthur's court and adventure ensues. Fun, fun, fun.
The tragic tale of love and loss during WWI.

Book.productname: A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man
Book.description: A a fictionalized memoir of Joyce's alter ego, Stephen Daedelus, describing his coming of age in Dublin.
Classic telling of life in two cities, London and Paris, during the upheaval of the French Revolution.
Classic American story of adventure and self-discovery in pre-Civil War Missouri.
Intricate intrigue of love and scandal in high society of Czarist Russia.
A slice of blue collar life and love and laughter during the Great Depression Monterrey, California
A tale of murder and justice in Czarist Russia
Personal adventure of the title character in England in the early 1800s.
Exploration of forbidden love and obsession with Venice in the background.
Classic personal drama set in the Spanish Civil War.
Gripping tale of crime and guilt, revenge and reward in 19th Century England.
An symbolic journey to the heart of man's inner demons.
Rich tale of crime, sin, punishment and redemption in pre-revolutionary France.
Tale of apprenticeship and inner growth before and during WWI Germany
Tragic and iconic tale of love and friendship told by one of Americas greatest writers.
A fish tale for the generations. A classic tale of man versus nature and his eventual defeat and triumph.
Tale of an orphan's journey from despair to triumph.
Humorous anecdotes of Twain's travels in the old west.
Classic tale of wealth and tragic romance.
Classic American story of life in pre-Civil War Missouri.
A tale of human drama told from the perspective of a father and his three sons.

Book.productname: The Cider House Rules: A Novel
Book.description: Classic tale following the life of a doctor who founded an orphanage in rural Maine before WWII and the orphans in his charge.
Joad family struggle with poverty and dignity in the great Depression.
Portrait of the excess and decadence of the Jazz Age. Fitzgerald's most popular and best selling novel.
Rich tale of tale of love, hate, revenge, and of a deformed man, Quasimodo, in 1482 France.
Classic tale of mistaken identity, intrigue and swashbuckling all rolled into one.
Guilt, repression, sin and redemption in Puritan New England before the Revolution.

Book.productname: The Snows of Kilimanjaro and Other Short Stories
Book.description: Life and death and adventure across Europe and Africa.
Follow the adventures of Jake Barnes through pre-Civil War Spain
An American tale of realistic surrealism following the life of fictional novelist T. S. Garp
Adventure, danger and betrayal in pre-Civil War Cuba
The journey of Leopold Bloom through Dublin during one day in 1904.
Vast tableau of life and death in Czarist Russia during the Napoleanic Wars.
